title: Equinox and Planet Fitness Plot the Return to the Gym (Podcast)
itunes:title: Equinox and Planet Fitness Plot the Return to the Gym (Podcast)
description:
Sheltering in place means not going out to work. It also means not going to work out. So how does fitness come back? Limited hours, expanded sanitation, personal protective equipment… getting fit is going to look a lot different, at the club, and in your home. We talk with two of the largest names in industry, Planet Fitness CEO Chris Rondeau and Equinox Executive Chairman Harvey Spevak. Plus our panel discusses the tale of 3 sports… NASCAR is back. Plus the NBA is on the verge of a restart while America's pastime deals with an economic showdown between players and owners. Our shake and bake team, Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch dissect it all.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
